sect2.title: Introduction to libvorbis
sect2.para: The libvorbis package contains a general purpose audio and music encoding format. This is useful for creating (encoding) and playing (decoding) sound in an open (patent free) format.

sect2.title: Installation of libvorbis
sect2.para: Install libvorbis by running the following commands:
libvorbis is known to cause compiler errors on certain machines. If you get errors, try these commands to install libvorbis:

userinput.command: ./configure --prefix=/usr && cd lib && cp Makefile Makefile.bak && sed s/-mno-ieee-fp// Makefile.bak > Makefile && cd .. && make && make install

sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --enable-docs: This switch enables building the documentation.
